Package com.jvn.musilog.util

Class AppAvailability

java.lang.Object
com.jvn.musilog.util.AppAvailability
public class AppAvailability extends Object
Utility class for checking if certain apps are installed on the device.
Since:
2024-03-16
Author:
Poleon Banouvong

  • Method Details

    • isAppAvailable

      public static boolean isAppAvailable(Context context, String packageId)
      Checks if an app is installed.
      Parameters:
      context - The Context to get the PackageManager from. This should be the application context.
      packageId - The ID of the app to look up
      Returns:
      A boolean telling if the app is installed

    • isSpotifyAppAvailable

      Checks if the Spotify app is installed.
      Parameters:
      context - The Context to get the PackageManager from. This should be the application context.
      Returns:
      A boolean telling if the Spotify app is installed
